content:
(iv) being used or driven when it is not registered or licensed under the legislation or when the registration or licensing under the legislation has been cancelled,
      (v) being used or driven with modifications that have not been approved by the Registrar of Vehicles in accordance with the Road Traffic (Motor Vehicles, Registration and Licensing) Rules or by any relevant regulatory authority.
questions: What are the consequences of using or driving a vehicle that is not registered?
Is it legal to drive a vehicle if its registration has been cancelled?
What happens if I drive a vehicle with modifications not approved by the Registrar of Vehicles?
Under which rules must vehicle modifications be approved?
Who is responsible for approving vehicle modifications according to the Road Traffic Rules?
Can a vehicle be used if it is not licensed under the legislation?
What are the implications of driving a vehicle without proper licensing?
What authority cancels the registration or licensing of a vehicle?
Are there specific regulations that address the use of unregistered vehicles?
Who enforces the rules regarding the registration and licensing of motor vehicles?
